site_name: Land To The Rear Of2 Ashfield RoadActonLondonW3 7JJ
description: Submission of the construction method statement pursuant to condition 4 of planning permission 220865FUL dated 22.11.2023 for 'Construction of a two storey residential dwelling comprising of self-contained unit, excavation of a basement and accommodation; associated parking, amenity space and refuse storage; formation of vehicle crossover and provision of turntable; installation of external steps to front and rear of property to allow entrance to lower ground floor and amenity space; alteration to boundary wall'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
